channel.title: New Merch Clan!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm makin a new merch clan. I have quite a bit of merch experience. This will be strictly a private merch clan with random stock checks. I will not release an item until there is [u][i][b]1b+ total invested[/b][/i][/u]. This clan is ran by my skiller acc, 6r33n 5k1ll2, and if you want to join you must fill out an application. The [u][i][b]minimum investment[/b][/i][/u] is [u][i][b]5m[/b][/i][/u].
Character Name: Devotion 1, 2, or 3 (1 investing a little bit; 2 half of my gp; 3 all my gp): Total Amount of GP: Amount Investing in First Merch: Merch Experience: Why I should bring you into the clan:
Thank you.

Anyone that joins this clan is dumb, the owner just wants to make money off of all you.
[/quote]

item.title: New Merch Clan!

@cloud3232 wrote:

actually no david. tha whole reason i made this clan was because i am tired of joining f2p merch clans and getting ripped off cuz only tha ranks get a profit. hence making my clan private so that it will be small and successful. -,- please do not flame

Runescape (myballzrgud) - Thank you. You are approved. Please add me in game.
